events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your resume and get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department, specifically for the Software Engineer role. We appreciate your interest.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the interview process for the Software Engineer position.
Your initial screening interview has been completed successfully. The recruiter was impressed with your background and technical skills.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the technical interview next week. We appreciate your prompt response and eagerness.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare for coding and system design questions.
You successfully completed your technical interview with positive feedback from the engineers about your problem-solving approach and coding.
The HR interview is scheduled for May 15th at 3:00 PM UTC. We will discuss company culture, benefits, and your questions.
Your HR interview went well. The HR manager appreciated your enthusiasm and alignment with the company values and work environment.
We are pleased to propose you an official offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits tailored to your experience.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer terms. We are glad the proposal meets your expectations and interests.
You have accepted the job offer for the Software Engineer role. Welcome aboard! We look forward to working with you.
Your onboarding process has begun. Please complete the necessary paperwork and attend the new hire orientation next week.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer position is now officially closed with your successful onboarding. Welcome to the team!
